profile.title: MY PROFILE
profile.description: A freelancer skilled in design and coding, experienced in various fields, and proficient in using a wide range of tools that can benefit your company.

taglines.title: DESIGN
taglines.description: Create project designs based on client needs while ensuring compliance with applicable standards and regulations.

taglines.title: DEFINE
taglines.description: Outline the prototype of the finalized work and ensure that all communicated information is clear and accountable.

taglines.title: DEVELOP
taglines.description: Execute the approved prototype and design, ensuring that the project progresses according to the agreed timeline.

about_web.text: is my personal portfolio website, fully created to fulfill my desire to produce works based on everything I have learned so far. In addition, I showcase several portfolios made using other tools that might be useful for your company.
